Full MOA: Inhibits Histamine-1(H1) receptors peripherally and centrally.
Inhibits cyclooxygenase (COX-1 and COX-2), decreasing the formation of prostaglandins.
Inhibits cyclooxygenase (COX-2), decreasing the formation of prostaglandins.
Binds to mu-opioid receptors in the CNS, altering the perception of and response to pain.
Inhibits the H+/K+ ATPase enzyme system in the gastric parietal cells, reducing the production of gastric acid.
Inhibits histamine at H2 receptors of the gastric parietal cells, reducing gastric acid secretion.
Selectively inhibits 5-HT3 receptors which blocks serotonin, both peripherally on vagal nerve terminals and centrally.
